title: Bleu de Chanel
description: Fresh citrus and woody scent. Hương gỗ nam tính. Perfect for the gym or office....

title: Dior Sauvage
description: Spicy and fresh. Hương tiêu cay nồng. Great for parties and date night....

title: Miss Dior
description: Sweet floral blooming bouquet. Hương hoa cỏ. Romantic date night....

title: Versace Eros
description: Minty vanilla, very sexy and loud. Vani ngọt ngào. Party beast....

title: CK One
description: Clean unisex citrus. Cam chanh tươi mát. Relaxing and daily use....
